title: [Sponsor] Literati
content:
No one has time for bad books. Literati is the most exciting new way to find and discuss bombshell books with brilliant people—people like Richard Branson, Austin Kleon, Stephen Curry, Malala, and more. Fresh books are revealed monthly, so you can explore every title and choose what you want to read. Then, join discussion threads and exclusive events in the app—and yeah, Stephen Curry might just “heart” your post. Start your trial for 99 cents at Literati.com.

 ★
author: Daring Fireball Department of Commerce
